name: Franco Nicolás Ribotta
about_me: I am a Software Engineer graduated from U.T.N. (Universidad Tecnológica Nacional Argentina). At the moment, I am working as a Full-Stack developer where I am in charge of managing the development and design team, coordinating appointments with clients, and developing new features using React for the front-end and Node.js for the back-end.

activities: Developed the Front-End using React (Typescript), axios, Redux (Redux, Redux-Thunk), HTML 5, CSS 3, Bootstrap, Tailwind.
Utilized Node.js (Javascript), Express, JWT and PostgresSQL for the Back-End.
Administered the development and design team, ensuring projects were delivered on time and to a high standard.
Managed the Github repository, controlled pull requests, and implemented Github actions for CD/CI.
Coordinated meetings with clients to discuss project requirements and ensure they were satisfied with the progress.
Developed new features and functionality using React.js, redux, redux-saga, react-router, axios, boostrap, and material ui for the Front-End.
Utilized Node.js, Express, JWT, Elasticsearch for the Back-End.
